GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19.4 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
Revert "ALSA: hda: Fix page fault in snd_hda_codec_shutdown()"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit c19305ce5228d63473e4e82d6d0ca8da50a058d2, it was introduced in version v5.19.4 by commit e02db5c2c2ee15bc9a9ec8a86a614fd091e584dc. For more details please see the references link.
